definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.chinese: 1998年世界盃體操賽平衡木冠軍。

sentences.english: She excels in vault, balance beam and uneven bars.
My little sister loves gym, in fact, she is good at balance beam.
sentences.chinese: 我妹妹喜歡體操，事實上，她擅長平衡木。

sentences.english: Forward piked salto mount to stand on beam is a new creation of "E" part.
sentences.chinese: “平衡木屈體前空翻站木”是E組創新動作。

sentences.english: Koko Tsurumi of Japan competes on the beam during the Gymnastics World Championships in London.
sentences.chinese: 日本鶴見科科在倫敦世界體操錦標賽平衡木精彩表演。

sentences.english: On the balance beam, the Chinese star Cheng Fei had fallen.
sentences.chinese: 在平衡木上，中國隊的明星隊員程菲落木。

sentences.english: The children having the acrophobia can be undertaken the balance beam training from the negative height.
sentences.chinese: 懼高症的兒童可從負高度進行平衡木訓練。

sentences.english: Flopping on a 4-inch beam, I like to do it, I'll be proud of it.
sentences.chinese: 能在四英寸上的平衡木上跳躍，我喜歡，也覺得自豪。

sentences.english: The girl lost her balance and fell off the balance beam.
sentences.chinese: 小女孩失蹤去了平衡，大平衡木上摔了下來。

sentences.english: She almost started to fall from the balance beam but recovered herself in time.
sentences.chinese: 她幾乎從平衡木上掉了下來，但及時恢復了平衡。
